summary:
### February 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/ctf.buidlguidl.com

- **User Interface Improvements**:
  - Merged PRs focused on enhancing the layout and usability of the stats tables and mobile header/footer.
  - Adjusted column alignment in stats tables for better readability and added dividers for clarity.

- **Stats Page Enhancements**:
  - Reorganized the stats page by moving the "Flags" section to the top and sorting sections in ascending order for improved user experience.

- **No Bug Fixes**:
  - No significant bug fixes were reported this month.

Overall, the activity this month primarily centered around user interface enhancements and improving the organization of information on the site.

topPRs.title: Change stats tables column alignment and add divider
